about.title: About FBR Signs
about.subtitle: Your trusted partner in professional signage solutions
about.description: With over 20 years of experience in the signage industry, FBR Signs has established itself as a premier provider of custom signage solutions. We combine traditional craftsmanship with cutting-edge technology to deliver exceptional results.
about.mission: Our mission is to help businesses communicate their brand message effectively through innovative, high-quality signage that stands the test of time.

story.title: Our Story
story.content1: Founded in 2009 with a vision to transform visual communication, FBR Signs has grown from a small local business to a leading signage company serving clients across multiple states.
story.content2: Our journey has been marked by continuous innovation, unwavering commitment to quality, and a passion for helping businesses stand out in today's competitive marketplace.
story.content3: We combine traditional craftsmanship with cutting-edge technology to deliver exceptional results that exceed our clients' expectations every time.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for perfection in every project, from design concept to final installation.

customerFocus.title: Customer Focus
customerFocus.description: Your success is our success. We prioritize your needs and exceed expectations.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We embrace new technologies and creative solutions to stay ahead of the curve.

teamwork.title: Teamwork
teamwork.description: Our collaborative approach ensures every project benefits from our collective expertise.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: The talented professionals behind your success

members.name: Sarah Johnson
members.bio: With over 15 years in the signage industry, Sarah leads our team with passion and expertise.

members.name: Mike Rodriguez
members.bio: Mike brings innovative design thinking and ensures every project exceeds expectations.

members.name: Emily Chen
members.bio: Emily oversees quality control and ensures timely delivery of all our projects.

members.name: David Thompson
members.bio: David leads our installation team with precision and commitment to safety.

client1.name: Sarah Johnson
client1.quote: FBR Signs transformed our storefront with a beautiful illuminated sign. Our foot traffic increased by 40% in the first month!

client2.name: Mike Chen
client2.quote: The digital LED sign has been a game-changer for our promotions. The quality and service exceeded our expectations.

client3.name: Lisa Rodriguez
client3.quote: Professional, reliable, and creative. FBR Signs delivered exactly what we envisioned for our medical center.

aiAssistant.title: FBRsigns AI
aiAssistant.subtitle: Let our AI assistant help you define your perfect signage project

welcome.title: Welcome to Your Personal Project Assistant
welcome.description: Not sure how to describe your signage needs? No problem! Our AI assistant will ask you simple questions to help define your perfect project. Whether it's signs, banners, t-shirts, or promotional materials, we'll guide you through every step.
